name: places/ChIJJ-1zFzdZwokRQ4s4vqF2l6A
formattedAddress: 451 West End Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 451 West End Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Finding the right place for my mother is an overwhelming task. I’m so glad we found Rod to apply his knowledge, experience and expertise and find a perfect match for mom.

ELDER CARE.

If you know, you know.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Thanks to  Rod Oshins at Assisted Living Advisers for the professional consulting services. Rod, you get five stars!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

July was a pretty hectic month as I had to, once again, search for a more affordable zip code for Mom. I’ve been sure to always place her in quality assisted living for Memory Care - but the increased cost of elder care outpaces inflation by a long shot, while her pension and social security remain fixed until her life story ends.

ZIP CODE MATTERS.
And with each move, she is farther and father away from me. For the first time, I had to cross state lines.

Thanks to Rod Oshins’ research, we moved her to a lovely place in New Jersey - but thankfully I live within 10 minutes of of the George Washington Bridge, and she is equidistant to it on the Jersey side. Thank goodness for Lyft - only 25 minutes away on a good day!

So far, I’m very happy with this choice. The staff is very friendly and attentive, so it took no time for Mom to adjust.

She has a sunny room equipped with a kitchenette all to herself - no roommates YAY! There is a gorgeous dining room, private dining for special events, several cozy living room spaces, outdoor patios, entertainment, cinema, art room, on-site wellness/nursing facility with visiting doctors and nurse practitioner weekly.

The decor is joyous and welcoming, centered around an old 1940s/50s Hollywood and Television movie star theme.

I’m grateful to Rod for helping to make sense out of what is otherwise a black box of information overload. I would 100% recommend him to any family who is looking for help in making this important decision .

originalText.text: Rod could not have been more helpful during one of the most challenging times in my life, making one the most difficult decisions in my life. With his support - research, time, patience, and listening ear - we found the right memory care community for my mother with Alzheimer’s. He is as much an expert in a complex and nuanced field, as he is an advisor and de facto therapist! I am just very thankful. I highly recommend Rod and Assisted Living Advisors.

text.text: Rod could not have been more helpful during one of the most challenging times in my life, making one the most difficult decisions in my life. With his support - research, time, patience, and listening ear - we found the right memory care community for my mother with Alzheimer’s. He is as much an expert in a complex and nuanced field, as he is an advisor and de facto therapist! I am just very thankful. I highly recommend Rod and Assisted Living Advisors.

originalText.text: Eric is very kind, patient and understanding to work with during what is always a difficult time for families. We were looking for assisted living and eventually ahead to memory care for a family member.  Eric was able to sift through a complex situation and help us to look with clarity at what was possible.  By carefully reviewing long term care insurance, thinking creatively and helping us to understand and to negotiate options, Eric opened possibilities that we thought were completely out of reach. The result is that we have found the best possible situation.  Finally – he stays connected and helpful with all the various challenges and problems that inevitably crop up after placement.  I recommend him most highly.

The result is that we have found the best possible situation.  Finally – he stays connected and helpful with all the various challenges and problems that inevitably crop up after placement.  I recommend him most highly.

originalText.text: Eric had referred me to Rod Oshins who I met while in NYC to look for the right facility to place my VERY difficult and resistant 98-year-old mother. His professionalism, sincere and unwavering interest, kind and professional manner, and thoroughness in navigating me through all my options was amazing. The 2 facilities he walked me through were spectacular. They could not have been more perfect for my mother, and were it not for a sudden downward change in her health, I would have moved her to one of them in a heartbeat. (I had showed her the brochures and she couldn't wait to see them.) I know she would have received unwavering and excellent care.  Assisted Living Advisors was as professional, thorough, and caring an organization as I have ever been in touch with. I recommend them, Eric, and Rod wholeheartedly.

originalText.text:
We could not be more thrilled with the amazing service that we received from Rod Oshins and Assisted Living Advisers.  My brother, sister and I were in a state of real panic when we met with Rod and he was able to walk us through all the steps we needed in order to get our mom into a terrific Assisted Living Facility not far from my mom’s home.

He made it all very easy and we couldn't be more grateful for his guidance and insight.  My whole family wholeheartedly recommends Rod and Assisted Living Advisor to anyone who needs any assistance to find a place for their loved one.
